nodes.text: Entha Kandela was the Zabrak female who lived on Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War and an Animal Control officer.

Entha Kandela served as Animal Control officer for the city of Mos Eisley, under the orders of Mayor Mikdanyell Guh'rantt. She was severely under-funded by the time of the Galactic Civil War. Because of this, the vermin outside the city walls became a major health hazard. Circa 1 ABY, she managed to get an individual to deal with the problem. While affiliated with Jabba the Hutt's criminal organizarion, the spacer acted on behalf of the Mayor Mikdanyell Guh'rantt. The spacer eliminated a number of womp rats, kreetles, worrts, tempest rills and rockmites for 2,150 credits, making Kandela very satisfied.
